author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

Congratulations, UK. You have answered the question of whether there is anything more ridiculous than one police officer arresting a person for praying in public. Or one police officer arresting someone for flying the UK flag in the UK. It's FIVE ARMED POLICE OFFICERS arresting a comedian at an airport for tweets that have been deemed "offensive" and therefore illegal in Britain.

Meet Graham Linehan, a comedian who claims in a Substack post that he was arrested as if he were a terrorist over three humorous X-Twitter posts mocking gender ideology and protestors. If you aren't famil
title: Five ARMED police officers arrest comedian at airport for the "crime" of offensive (and hilarious) tweets about gender ideology

author: Brodigan
description:
Greta Thunberg is back and the only thing worth talking about is her new hairstyle. The United Kingdom is having an immigration problem. No, not just Muslims. Hollywood types. Honestly, we’re not sure which is worse. This weekend, a number of CDC employees resigned in protest. We see this as an absolute win. Not so great; their next stop is probably the board of directors for a big pharma company.

BUSINESS IS GOOD IN SOMALIA:

  • Financial Disclosure Report
title: 🔴 Watch! RFK Jr. Straightens out CDC as Gay Scientists Run Screaming (Sources)

author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

It's been a three-day weekend. Let's check in to see how things are going in Chiraq.

MSNBC on Chicago's crime crisis:

"At least 54 people were shot — this is just over Labor Day weekend — seven killed."

"In one instance, a teenage girl was hit with a stray bullet."

"Those numbers just keep piling up." pic.twitter.com/ZHCsUKmXSx
— Rapid Response 47 (@RapidResponse47) September 2, 20
title: Another bloody three-day weekend in Chicago as the woke Mayor and Governor virtue signal over Trump doing something about it
